guid.description: The unique identifier of the sandbox.

name.description: The unique identifier of the sandbox.

checksums.description: A list of the uploaded checksums.

create_time.description: The timestamp at which the sandbox was created. An ISO 8601 fomatted string: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ e.g. 2013-12-24T21:00:00Z in UTC timezone or the string 'infinity'.

is_complete.description: true if the URLs in this sandbox were successfully uploaded.
